summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1298, for the improvement of Washington Street, in the City of Seattle, from 20th Avenue South to connection with the existing manholes in the sewer in 21st Avenue South, by constructing a sewer of proper dimensions and material, together with all necessary appurtenances, under Ordinance No. 14174 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
